column1: BBC News NI outlines the latest data on coronavirus and Covid-19 vaccinations across Northern Ireland and the Republic of Ireland.One Covid-19-related death has been reported in Northern Ireland on Monday.Deaths are measured by recording those who died within 28 days of receiving a positive result in a test for coronavirus.The total number of deaths linked to Covid-19 in Northern Ireland since the start of the pandemic is 2
column3: 635 new cases of coronavirus were reported in Northern Ireland on Monday
column5: 422 on Sunday.That includes cases confirmed from samples taken in recent days
column6: not necessarily just in the latest 24-hour reporting period.As of Monday
column7: the number of positive cases confirmed in the past seven days was 12
column10: 429 in the previous seven days. On Monday
column11: there were 301 patients with Covid-19 in hospitals in Northern Ireland
column12: no change from Sunday.There were also 34 patients with Covid-19 in hospital intensive care units. Last updated 6 December at 16:00 GMTSource: Department of Health Northern IrelandA total of 3
column14: 608 vaccines for Covid-19 had been administered in Northern Ireland as of Monday.Of those
column17: 135 of the jabs were first doses
column21: 280 were third doses.The remainder were booster jabs.Last updated 6 December at 16:00 GMTSource: Department of Health Northern IrelandThe total number of deaths linked to Covid-19 in the Republic of Ireland since the start of the pandemic is 5
column24: is updated weekly and includes "probable and possible" Covid-19-linked deaths.Another 2
column25: 950 cases of coronavirus were reported in the Republic of Ireland on Monday.There are 536 patients with Covid-19 in hospitals in the Republic of Ireland
column26: 110 of those are in intensive care units.Last updated 6 December at 18:05 local timeSource: Department of Health IrelandA total of 7
column28: 687 vaccines for Covid-19 had been administered in the Republic of Ireland as of Sunday.A total of 3
column30: 415 people have had their first dose and 3
column32: 754 have had their second dose.A total of 983
column33: 005 booster jabs had been administered as of Sunday.Last updated 6 December at 18:05 local timeSource: Department of Health Ireland
